Structure of The Skill¶

The Skill consists of four main parts, AttributeTable,SkillNodeLib,SkillLearningTree(In brief, SkillTree) and SkillEquipManager.

Structure¶

TheSkill is the overall system and inherits from MonoBehaviour as SkillEquipManager.

AttributeTable ,SkillNodeLiband SkillLearningTree inherit from ScriptableObjectwhich means they are data that can be modified and saved in edit mode.

When comes to runtime usage, SkillNodeLib is not required at all as long as you have attached a SkillLearningTree to the system TheSkill(Though the tree can only be generated from a SkillNodeLib).

Besides,you should also attach an AttributeTable to give a property reference for all your SkillNodes.

Do not worry about SkillEquipManager, it will be AutoGenerated when comeing to play mode.You are not required to create a manager by yourself.
